casebody.data:
Fourth Department,

March, 1951.

(March 7, 1951.) The People of the State of New York, Respondent, v. Herman E. Kreis, Appellant.

Judgment of conviction affirmed. All concur. (Appeal from a judgment convicting defendant of criminal negligence in violation of section 1053-a of the Penal Law.) Present — Taylor, P. J., Vaughan, Kimball, Piper and Wheeler, JJ.
